name: Aerobic
effect: Aerobic gifts the holder with SPD but also inflicts them with SPDEF whenever they use a Wind technique.

name: Air Specialist
effect: Air Specialist increases the damage of the holder's Wind techniques by 15%.

name: Amphibian
effect: Amphibian gifts the holder with SPD and ATK when hit with a Water technique.

name: Anaerobic
effect: Anaerobic gifts the holder with SPDEF but also inflicts them with SPATK whenever they use a Toxic technique.

name: Apothecary
effect: Apothecary causes all of the holders Special techniques to inflict the Poisoned Condition for 1 turn if the target was a rival or gift the Regenerated Condition for 1 turn if the target was an ally or itself.

name: Attack T
effect: Attack<T> changes the user's secondary Type to match the Technique they are about to use. If the move the Temtem is about to use is the same type as that Temtem's primary type, then the Temtem becomes a single-type Temtem of that type. For example, Oree becomes Digital/Electric when using Tesla Prison, and becomes pure Digital when using Turbo Attack.

name: Autotomy
effect: Autotomy gifts the holder with the Evading Condition for 2 turns upon entering the battlefield for the first time.

name: Avenger
effect: Avenger gifts the holder with SPD and SPATK whenever their ally is knocked out.

name: Benefactor
effect: Benefactor heals the holder's ally by 10% of their max HP whenever they take damage from a technique. The targeting of the technique doesn't matter and teheffect has no minimum value, meaning it can heal the ally for more HP than they lost due to getting attacked. It will only trigger if they take damage from a technique, so damage from other traits like Mirroring or from status conditions like the Poisoned Condition will not cause Benefactor to activate.

name: Body Stretch
effect: Body Stretch gifts the holder with the Regenerated Condition for 2 turns whenever they rest.

name: Book Lungs
description: Whenever a Temtem with Book Lungs takes damage from a Water technique, the damage is reduced by 50%.

name: Botanist
effect: Botanist increases the damage of the holder's Nature techniques by 15%.

name: Botanophobia
description: Whenever a Temtem with Botanophobia is attacked by a Nature Technique, the damage is increased by 50%.

name: Brawny
effect: Brawny increases the damage of the holder's Physical techniques by 20%.

name: Bully
description: Bully increases the holder's damage by an additional 30% while the number of conscious Temtem on the holder's team outnumber the number of conscious Temtem on the rival's team.

name: Burglar
description: When a Temtem with Burglar attacks another Temtem that has the Asleep Condition or the Exhausted Condition, the defender's gear will be disabled for the remainder of the combat.

name: Caffeinated
effect: Caffeinated protects the holder from being inflicted with the Asleep Condition.

name: Callosity
description: Whenever a Temtem with Callosity gets attacked by a Physical Technique, it then gets DEF . It cannot be triggered more than once per turn.

name: Camaraderie
description: Camaraderie reduces the damage the holder takes from attacks by 50% if both the holder and their ally are part of the same evolutionary line.

name: Channeler
effect: Channeler increases the damage of the holder's Special techniques by 25%.

name: Cobweb
description: Whenever a Temtem with Cobweb causes another Temtem to get the Poisoned Condition, or when it attacks a target that already has the Poisoned Condition, it also causes it to get the Trapped Condition for 2 turns.

name: Cold-Blooded
effect: Cold-Blooded causes the Temtem to gain the Regenerated Condition for 2 turns whenever its inflicted with the Cold Condition and prevents the Cold Condition from applying.

name: Cold-Natured
description: Whenever a Temtem with Cold-Natured would get the Cold Condition, they instead get the Frozen Condition for the same amount of turns.

name: Comebacker
effect: When an attacker targets a Temtem with Comebacker, the attacker takes 35% increased damage for the rest of the turn.

name: Common Factor
effect: When entering the battlefield, rivals and the ally get nullified for 2 turns.

name: Confined
effect: Confined gifts the holder with DEF and SPDEF when inflicted by the Trapped Condition if they inflicted it on themselves.

name: Coward's Rest
description: Whenever a Temtem with Coward's Rest rests, it gains the Evading Condition for 2 turns.

name: Deceit Aura
effect: Deceit Aura causes the turn order of all techniques used by all battlers present and the order of Temtem switched out to be reversed for the first four turns the holder is on the battlefield. Temtem swapping and item usage still occur prior to techniques.

name: Defuser
effect: Defuser causes all of the holder's Physical techniques to inflict the Seized Condition for 3 turns.

name: Demoralize
effect: Demoralize causes all rivals to be inflicted with SPD when the holder enters the battlefield.

name: Determined
description: Determined protects the holder's stats from being lowered by any number of stages.

name: Dreaded Alarm
effect: Dreaded Alarm causes all rival Temtem to lose 25% of their maximum HP when they rest.

name: Earthbound
effect: Earthbound gifts the holder with DEF whenever they use a Earth technique.

name: Effective Denial
effect: Currently, Effective Denial is unobtainable, so it's unknown what its full effect is.

name: Efficient
effect: Efficient reduces the STA cost of the holders damage dealing techniques by 30%.

name: Electric Custodian
effect: Electric Custodian causes all incoming Electric techniques targeted at the holder's ally to target the holder instead.

name: Electric Synthesize
effect: Electric Synthesize causes the holder to restore HP instead of taking damage from Electric techniques. The healing is equal to the amount of damage they would have received.

name: Energy Reserves
description: Energy Reserves, once per battle, gifts the holder with ATK and Vigorized Condition for 2 turns as soon as the holder's HP drops below 40%.

name: Escapist
description: While a Temtem with Escapist is on the battlefield, neither it nor its ally can get the Trapped Condition. Also, when it enters the battlefield, its ally loses the Trapped Condition if it has it.

name: Fainted Curse
effect: Fainted Curse causes the attacker who knocked-out the holder with a damage dealing technique to lose 30% of their maximum HP.

name: Fast Charge
effect: Fast Charge, once per battle, gifts the holder's Digital ally with SPD once both the holder and the ally are on the battlefield together.

name: Fever Rush
effect: Fever Rush gifts the holder with ATK whenever they get a status condition.

name: Flawed Crystal
description: Whenever a Temtem with Flawed Crystal takes damage from a technique that is either Mental, Toxic, or Electric, it takes 50% increased damage.

name: Friendship
effect: Friendship protects the holder from taking damage form any damaging technique from their ally.

name: Frightening
effect: Gear equipped on both opponent and allied Temtem will not have any effect on the holders or other Temtem for the first 2 turns a Temtem with Frightening is present on the battlefield.

name: Furor
description: Furor increases the damage of holder's techniques by 33% while their HP is below 33%.

name: Going Away Gift
effect: Going Away Gift gifts all the holders positive stat changes to their ally upon the holder being knocked-out.

name: Good Friend
effect: Good Friend causes a second rival attack that's directed at the holder's ally to be redirected to the holder.

name: Gotta Go Fast
effect: Gotta Go Fast causes all of the holders techniques that have Very Low, Low, and Normal priority to have High priority.

name: Guardian
description: The ally of a Temtem with Guardian cannot get the Cold Condition, Burned Condition, Poisoned Condition, or Doomed Condition, nor can it receive any negative stage changes to its stats.

name: Half Full
effect: Half Full, once per battle, gifts the holder with ATK , DEF , SPATK , and SPDEF but they lose 50% of their maximum HP upon entering the battlefield for the first time and will only activate while HP is full.

name: Heat Discharge
effect: Heat Discharge inflicts the attacker that knocked-out the holder with the Burned Condition for 3 turns.

name: Heater
effect: Once per battle when the user enters the field, the user inflicts both opponents with the Burned Condition for 1 turn.

name: Hover
description: Hover reduces the damage the holder takes from Earth techniques by 50%.

name: Hurry-wart
effect: Hurry-wart reduces the Hold of all the holder's techniques by 1 when they enter the battlefield.

name: Hydrologist
description: Hydrologist increases the damage of the holder's Water techniques by 15%.

name: Immunity
effect: Immunity causes the holder to take no damage from Toxic techniques and protects the holder from being inflicted with the Poisoned Condition.

name: Individualist
description: Temtem with Individualist cannot affect their ally with offensive techniques. If the technique also targets enemies, they will still be affected.

name: Inductor
effect: Inductor restores 8% of the holders HP every time a Electric technique is used on either side of the battlefield.

name: Infectious
effect: Infectious prevents the effects of the Regenerated Condition on the rival team. The condition will not be removed but will not have any effects. Infectious does not affect rival Temtem not on the battlefield.

name: Intimidator
effect: The Traits of both opponent and allied Temtem will not have any effect on themselves or other Temtem for the first 2 turns a Temtem with Intimidator is present on the battlefield.

name: Iridescence
description: The damage multipliers based on technique types are reversed. (Very) effective matchups become (very) ineffective and vice versa.

name: Kinetic Transfer
effect: Kinetic Transfer causes the holder to restore 10% of their maximum STA and their attacker to lose 10% of their maximum STA when the holder is hit by a damage dealing technique.

name: Landing Transmog
effect: Landing Transmog causes Mimit transforms into the next Temtem in clockwise order upon entering the battlefield. It will use the same base stats, techniques, trait and typing of the target. It will still keep its own level, SVs and TVs. It also won't take over any status conditions and stat modifiers which are currently applied on the target. If the next Temtem is a Mimit, then the transforming Mimit will skip to the next Temtem of a different species. If already transformed, returned, and sent out again, so long as the next Temtem in a different species than what is currently copied, Mimit will change when entering the battlefield.

name: Last Rush
effect: Last Rush increases the holder's damage by an additional 30% while the number of conscious Temtem on the rival's team outnumber the number of conscious Temtem on the holder's team.

name: Loneliness
effect: Loneliness makes the Temtem unable to use Synergies with its ally and the ally can't use synergies with it.

name: Marathonist
description: Marathonist causes the user to get SPD when attacking, but the stamina cost of the attack is reduced by 50%.

name: Mental Alliance
effect: Mental Alliance increases the holder's SPATK by 15% if their ally is Mental.

name: Mirroring
effect: Mirroring causes 40% of the damage the holder takes from Special techniques to be returned to the attacker so long as the holder survived the attack.

name: Mithridatism
description: Mithridatism protects the holder from being inflicted with the Poisoned Condition.

name: Motivator
effect: Motivator causes both the holder and their ally to restore 10% of their maximum STA at the start of each turn.

name: Mucous
description: Mucous reduces the damage the holder takes from Electric and Toxic techniques by 30% and protects them from receiving the Cold Condition and the Burned Condition.

name: Neurotoxins
effect: Neurotoxins causes all of the holder's techniques that can inflict the Poisoned Condition to instead inflict the Doomed Condition with a 4 turn countdown.

name: Neutrality
description: Neutrality prevents the holder from being inflicted with any negative status conditions like the Poisoned Condition or the Burned Condition.

name: Parrier
effect: Parrier reduces the amount of damage the holder takes from Physical technqiues by 30%.

name: Patient
description: Patient restores 10% of the holders maximum STA when they use a technique that has any amount of Hold.

name: Physmaster
effect: Physmaster increases the damage of the holder's Physical techniques by 50%.

name: Pigment Inverter
effect: Pigment Inverter causes the holder's target to have inverted type resistances. For example: if the holder attacks a Water target with a Fire technique, the target will receive x2 the normal damage from the technique rather than the usual x0.5 the damage.

name: Plethoric
description: Plethoric increases the holder's SPD by 30% so long as their HP is 70% or higher.

name: Power Nap
description: At the start of the turn, if a Temtem with Power Nap has the Asleep Condition, it restores 15% of its maximum HP.

name: Prideful
effect: Prideful gifts the holder with SPD , ATK , and SPATK when they knock-out a target.

name: Protector
description: When a Temtem with Protector enters the battlefield, it loses 10% of its maximum HP and gets Trapped Condition for 2 turns, and its ally gets DEF and SPDEF , even if the ally is immediately then swapped out.

name: Provident
effect: Provident gifts the holder with SPDEF when attacked by a Fire, Earth, or Melee technique.

name: Punching Bag
description: If a Temtem with Punching Bag is attacked by a Melee technique, it takes 30% less damage.

name: Puppet Master
effect: Puppet Master causes all incoming, rival, single target techniques aimed the holder to be redirected to their ally so long as the holder's HP is below 40%.

name: Pyromaniac
effect: Pyromaniac increases the damage of the holder's Fire techniques by 15%.

name: Rejuvenate
effect: Rejuvenate causes the holder to restore 7% of their maximum HP after attacking with a Special technique.

name: Relaxed
effect: Relaxed restores 15% of the holder's maximum HP so long as the holder does not take any damage by techniques from the opposing team.

name: Resilient
effect: Resilient, once per battle, protects the holder from knocking themselves out due to overexertion by leaving them with 1 HP, gifts them with SPD , and negates the overexertion turn penalty.

name: Resistant
description: Resistant reduces the duration of negative status conditions on the holder by 1 turn. The status conditions affected include: the Cold Condition, the Asleep Condition, the Trapped Condition, the Seized Condition, the Poisoned Condition, the Burned Condition, and the Exhausted Condition.

name: Rested
effect: Rested increases the holder's ATK and SPATK by 30% for the first 2 turns they are on the battlefield. It only activates once per battle.

name: Royal Jelly
effect: At the start of the turn the user and its ally restore 3% of their max HP.

name: Scavenger
effect: Scavenger restores 20% of the holders maximum HP when another Temtem, weather it be an ally or opponent, is knocked-out.

name: Self-Esteem
effect: Self-Esteem cures the holder of the Cold Condition, the Trapped Condition, the Seized Condition, the Poisoned Condition, the Burned Condition, the Doomed Condition, the Isolated Condition, and the Exhausted Condition when they knock-out a target.

name: Sensei
effect: Sensei causes the holder to use their SPATK instead of their ATK when using a Physical technique and use their ATK instead of their SPATK when using a Special technique.

name: Sentinel
description: Sentinel protects the holder and their ally from the Asleep Condition and cures their ally of the Asleep Condition when the holder enters the battlefield.

name: Seppuku
effect: When attacking and knocked-out due to overexertion, the target gets doomed for 2 turns.

name: Settling
effect: Settling increases the holder's ATK increases by 8% for each turn they are on the battlefield. If the holder leaves the battlefield at any point, the cumulative bonus is reset.

name: Shared Pain
effect: Shared Pain protects the holder from receiving damage from a second attack from the rival team that turn by redirecting it to their ally.

name: Skull Helmet
description: Temtem with Skull Helmet take 25% less damage from techniques that are either Mental or Melee.

name: Snowstorm
effect: Snowstorm, once per battle, inflicts both rivals and the holder's ally with the Cold Condition for 3 turns of they aren't already inflicted with the Cold condition when the holder enters the battlefield.

name: Soft Touch
effect: Soft Touch allows the holder to attack a target afflicted with the Asleep Condition without removing it and damage done to Asleep targets is increased by 20%.

name: Source Replicator
effect: Source Replicator copies any positive status condition the holder has and gifts them to their ally for the same duration.

name: Specmaster
effect: Specmaster increases the damage of the holder's Special techniques by 50%.

name: Splitter
effect: Splitter protects the holder from negative status conditions like the Poisoned Condition or the Burned Condition when attacked with a Physical or Special technique. For example: Embers won't inflict Burn and Toxic Ink won't inflict Poisoned.

name: Spoilsport
description: Whenever a Temtem with Spoilsport uses a Technique that can hit multiple targets, it does 25% more damage.

name: Spreader
description: Whenever a Temtem with Spreader attacks with a Special Technique, if there are multiple enemy Temtem on the battlefield, the attack affects the entire target team instead but only deals ~66% damage.

name: Stabmaster
effect: Stabmaster boosts the damage of the holders techniques that are the same type as the holder by 40%. This boost stacks with STAB.

name: Striking Transmog
effect: Striking Transmog cases Mimit to transform into a targeted Temtem if the holder hits them with a Physical technique. If the technique hits multiple targets, Mimit will transform into the furthest clockwise target. It will use the same Base Stats, Techniques, Traits and Typing of the target. It will still keep its own Level, Single Values and Training Values. It also won't take over any Status Conditions and Stat Modifiers which are currently applied on the target.

name: Strong Liver
description: Strong Liver causes the holder to restore HP instead of taking damage from Toxic techniques. The healing is equal to the amount of damage they would have received.

name: Synergy Master
description: Whenever a Temtem with Synergy Master or its ally uses a Synergy Technique, it does 25% more damage.

name: Synertyper
effect: Synertyper increases the damage of the holder's techniques by 30% if both the holder and their ally share a type.

name: Tactical Strike
description: Whenever a Temtem with Tactical Strike attacks with a technique with a hold of 1 or more, it deals 15% more damage.

name: Tardy Rush
description: Tardy Rush increases the holder's SPD by 100% and ATK by 10% after being on the battlefield for 3 turns in a row. The effect lasts until the holder leaves the battlefield. If the holder is swapped in, the turn they enter the battlefield counts as turn 1.

name: Target Replicator
effect: Target Replicator causes the holder to copy any positive status conditions that their ally has to themselves for the same duration.

name: Team Elusive
description: When a Temtem, whether enemy or ally, uses a multi-target technique that would hit a Temtem with Team Elusive, instead, it isn't affected. If Puppet Master would cause a Temtem with Team Elusive to be the target of an attack, it will. Puppet Master does not trigger Team Elusive.

name: Thick Skin
description: Thick Skin reduces the damage the holder takes from Wind techniques by 50%.

name: Tireless
effect: Tireless gifts the holder with ATK when they overexert and ignore the turn penalty from overexerting.

name: Toxic Affinity
description: Toxic Affinity increases the base damage of the holder's Toxic techniques by x1.5, as if they had STAB. This stacks with actual STAB if the holder is also Toxic, resulting in a total multiple of x2.25 (1.5 x 1.5).

name: Toxic Farewell
effect: Toxic Farewell inflicts the attacker that knocked-out the holder with the Poisoned Condition for 3 turns and they lose 10% of their maximum HP.

name: Toxic Skin
description: When a Temtem uses a Physical Technique on a target with Toxic Skin, the attacker gets the Poisoned Condition for 2 turns.

name: Trance
description: If a Temtem with Trance is the target of a technique, and afterwards its HP is 30% or less of its maximum, it gets the Asleep Condition for 2 turns and the Regenerated Condition for 4 turns, and also gets SPATK and SPDEF . This is regardless of if the technique did damage, but Trance only can ever trigger once per battle.

name: Trauma
description: When a Temtem with Trauma takes damage from a Physical Technique, it gets DEF . When it is takes damage from a Special Technique, it gets SPDEF .

name: Tri-Apothecary
effect: Tri-Apothecary causes all of the holders Special techniques to inflict the Poisoned Condition for 3 turns if the target was a rival or gift the Regenerated Condition for 3 turns if the target was an ally or itself.

name: Unnoticed
effect: Unnoticed gifts the holder with SPD so long as the holder does not take any damage by techniques from the opposing team.

name: Vigorous
description: When Temtem with Vigorous use a technique that causes it to overexert, the damage is increased 50%.

name: Voltaic Charge
effect: Voltaic Charge inflicts the holder's attacker with 10% of the damage they just received as long as the holder was the only target of the attacker's technique.

name: Voodoo
effect: When attacking an ally, the damage is replicated to each rival.

name: Warm-Blooded
effect: Warm-Blooded protects the holder from receiving the Cold Condition.

name: Water Affinity
description: Toxic Affinity increases the base damage of the holder's Water techniques by x1.5, as if they had STAB. This stacks with actual STAB if the holder is also Water, resulting in a total multiple of x2.25 (1.5 x 1.5).

name: Water Custodian
effect: Water Custodian causes all incoming Water techniques targeted at the holder's ally to target the holder instead.

name: Water Synthesizer
effect: Water Synthesizer causes the holder to restore HP instead of taking damage from Water techniques. The healing is equal to the amount of damage they would have received.

name: Wax Bath
effect: When the ally of the user rests, they get SPDEF .

name: Withdrawal
effect: Withdrawal restores 20% of the holder's maximum HP and cures them of the Asleep Condition and the Poisoned Condition when they rest.

name: Wrecked Farewell
effect: Wrecked Farewell causes all rivals to lose 25% of their maximum HP when the holder knocks itself out by either overexertion or by using self-damaging techniques like Madness Buff.

name: Zen
effect: Zen gifts the holder with DEF and SPDEF when inflicted with the Asleep Condition.
